entry.title: 77 MILLION REASONS TO BE CHEERFUL – BUT LAWWELL FIRES WARNING
entry.summary: CELTIC have announced another robust set of financial results to reveal the club’s bank balance has increased to a record £77.2million. But chairman Peter Lawwell has still fired a warning against complacency as the champions go from strength to strength. entry.title: HAPPY 61st ANNIVERSARY, CELTIC: YOGI HITS HAT-TRICK IN FIRST-EVER EURO WIN
entry.summary: JOHN HUGHES fired in a blistering hat-trick as Celtic claimed their first-ever win in Europe – EXACTLY 61 years ago today. The Hoops great, who sadly passed away on August 1 2022 at the age of 79, led the way as the Parkhead outfit walloped Basle 5-1 in Switzerland in a Cup-Winners’ Cup-tie on September 17 [...]
